en: That hotel was established about 50 years ago.
zh: 那家酒店大约50年前就成立了。

en: I'm staying at that hotel.
That hotel serves very good food.
zh: 那家酒店的食物非常好吃。

en: I get depressed thinking that a guy like our boss can have ultimate power over us.
zh: 一想到像我们老板那样的人可以拥有绝对的权力，我就感到沮丧。

en: The bowl contains many kinds of candy.
zh: 这个碗里有很多种糖果。

en: That pen is more expensive than this one.
Let's sit down on that bench.
zh: 我们去那边的长椅上坐下吧。

en: Don't sit on that bench.
His wife caught him out with that blonde and then he was really up shit creek without a paddle.
zh: 他老婆抓到他和那个金发女郎在一起，然后他就真的倒大霉了。

en: The professional skier liked to "hot-dog" down the mountain.
zh: 那位职业滑雪运动员喜欢在山上炫技。

en: We have got to get him to take that project seriously.
zh: 我们一定要让他认真对待那个项目。

en: It is a toss-up whether the playboy will marry the blonde or the brunette; both girls are so beautiful.
zh: 那个花花公子会娶金发女郎还是黑发女郎，真是个悬念；两个女孩都很漂亮。

en: It is only a few months since that Frenchman came to Japan.
zh: 那个法国人来日本才几个月。

en: The grapes are sour.
That football player is gigantic.
zh: 那个足球运动员非常巨大。

en: That folk singer is very popular with people in general.
zh: 那位民谣歌手很受大众欢迎。

en: Who is the woman dressed in pink?
zh: 那个穿粉红色衣服的女人是谁？

en: How many floors does that building have?
How high is that building?
The owner of that building is living on the 5th floor of this building.
zh: 那栋楼的业主住在这栋楼的5楼。

en: Look above that building.
There's a great view from the rooftop of that building. Want to go see?
zh: 从那栋楼的屋顶可以看到很棒的景色。想去看看吗？

en: The view from the top of that building was magnificent.
zh: 从那栋楼顶看到的景色非常壮丽。

en: It's on the first floor of that building.
No man lives in the building.
It's next to that building.
That terrible noise is driving me mad.
zh: 那个可怕的噪音快把我逼疯了。

en: I'd like that beer, please.
That pianist is known for his skill.
zh: 那位钢琴家以他的技巧闻名。

en: That pianist is known for his technique.
zh: 那位钢琴家以他的技术闻名。

en: Look at that good-looking boy.
Boy, that hamburger really hit the spot.
Those roses are very beautiful.
I suspect they water down the beer in that pub.
zh: 我怀疑他们在那家酒吧里兑水啤酒。

en: That bus will take you to the zoo.
zh: 那辆公交车会带你去动物园。

en: Don't climb that ladder - it's not secure.
zh: 别爬那个梯子——它不安全。

en: That bar is one of his favorite haunts.
zh: 那家酒吧是他最喜欢去的地方之一。

en: Whose notebook is that?
The color of that tie does not match the suit.
zh: 那条领带的颜色和这套西装不搭。

en: When I heard the news I was caught with my pants down.
zh: 当我听到这个消息时，我措手不及。

en: That dress really becomes her.
I think that style of dress will return again next year.
zh: 我认为那种款式的连衣裙明年会再次流行。

en: A wide leather belt would look good with that dress.
zh: 一条宽皮带配那件连衣裙会很好看。

en: Each episode of that TV drama ends with somebody delivering a profound line.
zh: 那部电视剧的每一集都以某人说出一句深刻的台词结尾。

en: Let me have a look at that book of Tom's.
zh: 让我看看汤姆的那本书。

en: I wish I had been with her then.
zh: 我希望那时我和她在一起。

en: I wish I had known his name then.
zh: 我希望那时我知道他的名字。

en: If he hadn't taken that flight then, he would be alive now.
zh: 如果他那时没有乘坐那趟航班，他现在还活着。

en: The promise I made then still holds.
zh: 我那时做出的承诺仍然有效。

en: I wish I had had a camera then.
zh: 我希望那时我有一台相机。

en: There is a lot of traffic on that street.
That TV station broadcasts only movies.
zh: 那个电视台只播放电影。

en: That TV station is on the air 24 hours a day.
zh: 那个电视台每天24小时播出。

en: How do you like that TV news program?
zh: 你觉得那个电视新闻节目怎么样？

en: A sale of quality-brand goods is being held at that department.
zh: 那家百货公司正在举办名牌商品促销活动。

en: Men's suits are on sale this week at that department store.
zh: 那家百货商店本周正在促销男士西装。

en: We had a thrilling time at the theme park.
zh: 我们在主题公园玩得很刺激。

en: I asked for a table over there.
Take the book that has been left on the table.
zh: 把留在桌子上的那本书拿走。

en: Take the book which is lying on that table.
zh: 把放在桌子上的那本书拿走。

en: That tour already has a waiting list.
zh: 那个旅游团已经有等候名单了。

en: That team is always in the cellar.
That team has little, if any, chance of winning.
zh: 那个队几乎没有获胜的机会。

en: That talent is much sought after.
The dark horse candidate was losing in the polls before the primary.
zh: 那个黑马候选人在初选前民调落后。

en: That sofa is less expensive than this table.
zh: 那个沙发比这张桌子便宜。

en: That salesman looks pretty smart.
zh: 那个销售员看起来很精明。

en: Have you finished knitting that sweater?
If you go to that supermarket, you can buy most things you use in your daily life.
zh: 如果你去那家超市，你可以买到你日常生活中使用的大部分东西。

en: That suit has an expensive look.
The amateur singer won first in the talent show hands down.
zh: 那个业余歌手在才艺表演中轻松赢得第一名。

en: The show was very interesting. You should have seen it.
zh: 那个节目很有趣。你应该看看的。

en: That jumbo jet accommodates 400 passengers.
zh: 那架大型喷气式飞机可容纳400名乘客。

en: Try on that shirt. It's made of fine cotton.
zh: 试试那件衬衫。它是用优质棉制成的。

en: Try on that shirt.
That shirt is very dirty. It needs washing before you go to school.
zh: 那件衬衫很脏，你上学前需要洗一下。

en: The stew must have disagreed with me.
zh: 我一定是吃那份炖菜吃坏了肚子。

en: That football is made of genuine leather.
zh: 那个足球是用真皮做的。

en: Who is that lady?
A cup of coffee cost 200 yen in those days.
zh: 那时候一杯咖啡要200日元。

en: I used to go home for lunch in those days.
zh: 那时候我经常回家吃午饭。

en: If he had trained himself harder at that time, he would be healthier now.
zh: 如果他当时更努力地训练自己，现在就会更健康了。

en: That commercial makes a strong impression - especially the music. It stays in your head.
zh: 那个广告给人留下了深刻的印象——尤其是音乐。它一直在你的脑海里。

en: He is an unmanageable child.
That is the girl whose father is a doctor.
zh: 那是她爸爸是医生的女孩。

en: That coat may have cost a lot of money, but it's worth it.
zh: 那件外套可能花了很多钱，但很值。

en: May I eat that cake?
The group was planning a bull session to talk about the upcoming party.
zh: 那个小组正计划进行一次漫谈，讨论即将到来的聚会。

en: You should cut off your connections with that group.
zh: 你应该切断和那个团体的联系。

en: Do you know who that tall blonde girl in green is?
zh: 你知道那个穿绿色衣服的高个金发女孩是谁吗？

en: In a sense you are right in refusing to join that club.
zh: 从某种意义上说，你拒绝加入那个俱乐部是对的。

en: Who is that pretty girl?
Do you know that nice-looking girl?
zh: 你认识那个好看的女孩吗？

en: That guitar is so expensive that I can't buy it.
zh: 那把吉他太贵了，我买不起。

en: I wish I could buy that guitar.
zh: 我希望我能买那把吉他。

en: If that guitar were not so expensive, I could buy it.
zh: 如果那把吉他不那么贵，我就能买它了。

en: That pretty bird did nothing but sing day after day.
zh: 那只漂亮的鸟日复一日地只是唱歌。

en: That cute baby is the fruit of their love.
zh: 那个可爱的宝宝是他们爱情的结晶。

en: Look at that pretty little girl.
zh: 看看那个漂亮的小女孩。

en: That pretty girl is my sister.
zh: 那个漂亮的女孩是我的妹妹。

en: You need another ten dollars to buy that camera.
zh: 你还需要十美元才能买那个相机。

en: What did you do with that camera?
zh: 你把那个相机弄到哪里去了？

en: I'm dying for that camera.
Could you put those bags in the car for me?
zh: 你能帮我把那些包放到车里吗？

en: That couple gets soused nearly every night.
zh: 那对夫妇几乎每天晚上都喝得烂醉。

en: That cocktail is sweet and easy to drink.
zh: 那款鸡尾酒很甜，容易入口。

en: That car dealer gave me a bum steer when he told me this used Toyota was in good condition.
zh: 那个汽车经销商骗了我，他说这辆二手丰田车况很好。

en: I wonder who's buried in that tomb.
zh: 我想知道谁埋葬在那座坟墓里。

en: Why don't you give your seat to that old gentleman?
zh: 你为什么不把座位让给那位老先生呢？

en: What did you do with that money?
zh: 你把那些钱弄到哪里去了？

en: What shall we buy with that money?
zh: 我们用那些钱买什么好呢？

en: That toy is made of wood.
Why not try that delicious wine?
zh: 为什么不尝尝那款美味的葡萄酒呢？

en: Hi. I feel kind of sick.
zh: 你好。我感觉有点不舒服。

en: I think we're out of your size.
zh: 我想我们没有你的尺码了。

en: I cannot stop that noisy cat from getting into my garden.
zh: 我无法阻止那只吵闹的猫进入我的花园。

en: That dog is big.
The cousins are similar in appearance but widely different in character.
zh: 表兄弟姐妹外貌相似，但性格迥异。

en: That Italian author is little known in Japan.
zh: 那位意大利作家在日本鲜为人知。

en: That naughty child needs a good beating.
zh: 那个淘气的孩子需要好好打一顿。

en: Go and beat up that bully.
The Englishman likes doing better than talking.
zh: 英国人喜欢行动胜于空谈。

en: The house is vacant.
That house appears deserted.
zh: 那房子看起来像是被遗弃了。

en: No pets are allowed in that apartment house.
zh: 那栋公寓楼不允许养宠物。

en: Will that idea come off?
The relationships among those five people are complicated.
zh: 那五个人的关系很复杂。

en: It seems those two are made for each other.
zh: 看来他们俩是天生一对。

en: Those two really hit it off.
Those two boys are cousins.
One of them is a spy.
It's in the air that they may get married.
zh: 有传言说他们可能会结婚。

en: Uh..., where's the post office?
Well... actually, I'm sick.
Um, is the room quiet?
Annie ate nervously.
Let's have a seat over there, Annie.
You must talk to her in person.
She will be flattered if you go to see her in person.
zh: 如果你亲自去看她，她会很高兴的。

en: You are to obey your parents.
You must think by yourselves.
You can take part in the meeting regardless of your age.
zh: 无论年龄大小，你都可以参加会议。

en: How did you come to know each other?
They as well as you are ordinary people.
zh: 他们和你一样，都是普通人。

en: You should not be surprised at my saying, 'You must be born again.'
zh: 你不应该对我说“你必须重生”感到惊讶。

en: It's surprising to know that your school starts at 8:30 and ends at 3:30.
zh: 得知你们学校早上八点半上课，下午三点半放学，真是令人惊讶。

en: Allow me to introduce my wife to you.
zh: 请允许我向你介绍我的妻子。

en: Here's to you! Cheers!
Please tell me why you don't eat meat.
zh: 请告诉我你为什么不吃肉。

en: I hear you Americans like to move from place to place.
zh: 我听说你们美国人喜欢搬来搬去。

en: You may depend on him to help you.
zh: 你可以依靠他来帮助你。

en: I am no more excited than you are.
You're such a lovely audience.
How many of you are there?
Never teach a child anything of which you are not yourself sure.
zh: 不要教孩子任何你自己都不确定的事情。

en: It is important to have a sense of your own.
zh: 拥有自己的意识很重要。

en: You told me so yourself.
You had better go in person.
I think it necessary for you to go in person.
zh: 我认为你有必要亲自去一趟。

en: Are you proposing, knowing that this won't be my first marriage?
zh: 你知道这不是我的第一次婚姻，你还要向我求婚吗？

en: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
zh: 除了你自己，没有什么能给你带来平静。

en: Pardon all but thyself.
You may as well make friends with people who need you.
zh: 你还不如和需要你的人交朋友。

en: Let me introduce you to Mr Tanaka.
zh: 我来给你介绍一下田中先生。

en: I don't have anything else to do but wait for you.
zh: 我除了等你，什么事都做不了。

en: I love you with all my heart.
It's my duty to help you.
I'm sorry, I can't help you.
You must have such friends as will help you.
zh: 你必须要有能帮助你的朋友。

en: I will give you a ride in my car.
zh: 我可以用我的车送你一程。

en: I want you to meet my parents.
zh: 我想让你见见我的父母。

en: I'm on your side.
I'm sorry I misunderstood you.
I never see you without thinking of my dead son.
zh: 每次看到你，我都会想起我死去的儿子。

en: I never see you without thinking of Ken.
zh: 每次看到你，我都会想起健。

en: You remind me of your brother.
zh: 你让我想起了你的哥哥。

en: I never see you without remembering your father.
zh: 我每次见到你都会想起你的父亲。

en: You remind me of your mother.
zh: 你让我想起了你的母亲。

en: You remind me of your father.
zh: 你让我想起了你的父亲。

en: Do you know the man gazing at you?
zh: 你认识那个盯着你看的人吗？

en: I mistook you for my brother.
zh: 我把你错认成我的哥哥了。

en: I did not want to alarm you.
I remember you. We met three years ago.
zh: 我记得你。我们三年前见过。

en: There is a good argument for dismissing you.
zh: 解雇你是有充分理由的。

en: I'd like to enroll you as a member of our club.
zh: 我想让你加入我们的俱乐部。

en: I will see you home.
I'm filled with love for you.
I was born to love you.
Can I call you Bob?
I'd like to invite you to the party.
I'm proud to have you on our team.
zh: 我很自豪你能在我们的团队里。

en: I'm thinking of taking you to see Mr Jenkins.
zh: 我正考虑带你去见詹金斯先生。

en: If I scold you, it is not that I am angry.
zh: 如果我责骂你，并不是因为我生气。

en: I can never make you out.
I'm sorry I've kept you waiting so long.
You will be called Cephas.
We are glad to have you in our class.
zh: 我们很高兴你加入我们的班级。

en: I meant to have called on you.
I didn't want to alarm you.
You were talking in your sleep last night.
Please tell me about you and your family.
zh: 请你告诉我关于你和你家人的事。

en: I wish you had been there.
zh: 我希望你当时也在那里。

en: Do you have to go to market, too?
I gather you'll agree with me.
Try staring at yourself.
Can you do as much?
Neither you nor I are mistaken.
I wish you had come with us.
zh: 我希望你和我们一起来了。

en: Both you and I are students.
Wouldn't you like to come with us, too?
zh: 你不想和我们一起来吗？

en: It is about time you married.
You will soon get accustomed to the noises.
zh: 你很快就会习惯这些噪音的。

en: Do you also like jazz?
You were his greatest fan, you see.
zh: 你知道，你是他最忠实的粉丝。

en: You should have come with us.
zh: 你应该和我们一起来的。

en: I'm more in love with you.
It is a pity that a man of your ability should remain unknown to the world.
zh: 真可惜，像你这样有能力的人竟然不为世人所知。

en: It's a present for you.
You have a watch.
You look good in a kimono.
Which period of history are you studying?
zh: 你在学习哪个历史时期？

en: I admire you for keeping your head.
Can you tell green from blue?
zh: 你能分辨绿色和蓝色吗？

en: Do you look up to your parents?
You are old enough to be independent of your parents.
zh: 你已经足够独立，可以脱离父母了。

en: You should buy an answering machine.
You are coming down with the flu, or something serious.
zh: 你好像得了流感，或者更严重的病。

en: You should go on to a technical college.
You have to settle down and study for the history test.
zh: 你必须静下心来，好好准备历史考试。

en: Will you live in Sasayama next year?
You will have to go to England next year.
When will you live in Sanda next year?
zh: 你明年什么时候会住在三田？

en: You will be able to read this book next year.
zh: 明年你就能读懂这本书了。

en: Will you go to America next year?
You have to put off your departure for England till next week.
zh: 你必须把去英国的行程推迟到下周。

en: You have to stay in bed until next Monday.
zh: 你必须卧床休息到下周一。

en: Will you go to America next month?
You must make up the loss next week.
zh: 你必须在下周弥补损失。

en: You need not have come.
Are you the prophet?
You needn't come.
You have to make a reservation.
Haven't you had your dinner?
Do you have to make dinner?
You must not play.
You shouldn't break promises.
You are ten minutes behind the appointed time.
You have only to play a role.
zh: 你只需要扮演一个角色。

en: You had better not sit up late at night.
Do you know baseball?
You must not go out at night.
Don't you sleep well at night?
You are exaggerating the problem.
Can you walk with your eyes closed?
zh: 你可以闭着眼睛走路吗？

en: Are your eyes bad?
You must hand in your homework by Thursday without fail.
zh: 你必须在星期四之前交作业，不得延误。

en: Are you reading an interesting book?
zh: 你在读一本有趣的书吗？

en: Please return the book by tomorrow.
You will be busy tomorrow.
Will you study tomorrow?
You will be able to see him tomorrow.
You will be able to get the news from him tomorrow.
zh: 你明天就能从他那里得到消息了。

en: Are you going to school tomorrow?
Can you go to the beach tomorrow?
What are you going to do tomorrow?
It seems necessary for you to come again tomorrow.
zh: 看来你明天有必要再来一次。

en: You'll have to get up early tomorrow morning.
Where will you be this time tomorrow?
zh: 明天这个时候你会在哪里？

en: When will you be busy tomorrow?
Will you go out tomorrow?
Are you free tomorrow?
Can you do without the car tomorrow? I need it.
zh: 你明天能不用车吗？我需要用。

en: You should not sleep.
Are you satisfied or dissatisfied?
You're not satisfied, are you?
You have only to practice every day.
Do you go to school on foot every day?
Do you run every day?
Do you go shopping every day?
Do you listen to the radio at home every day?
zh: 你每天在家听收音机吗？

en: Do you study English every day?
What time do you get up every day?
How long do you play tennis every day?
How long do you study English every day?
zh: 你每天学习英语学习多久？

en: You tried very hard every day.
What time do you get up every morning?
What time do you usually get up every morning?
zh: 你通常每天早上几点起床？

en: You get up at 5 o'clock every morning.
You've never seen a genuine diamond.
zh: 你从来没见过真正的钻石。

en: You didn't really see a ghost - it was only imaginary.
zh: 你不是真的看到鬼了，那只是想象出来的。

en: You are really clumsy, aren't you!
zh: 你真是太笨手笨脚了，不是吗！

en: Will you really send me a Japanese doll?
zh: 你真的会送我一个日本娃娃吗？

en: You're a magician with a needle and thread.
Can you swim at all?
I wonder if you are truly happy.
zh: 我想知道你是不是真的快乐。

en: Do you really want it?
I think you're a really nice guy.
Every time you read a book, you will be the better for it.
zh: 每次你读一本书，你都会变得更好。

en: You have a lot of books.
You have to make a careful choice of books.
You are from Hokkaido, aren't you?
Have you been to Hokkaido?
You look busy.
You were busy.
You aren't busy, are you?
Are you busy?
I asked him if he was busy.
You have a sharp sense of direction.
Will you go on foot or by bus?
zh: 你步行去还是坐公交车去？

en: Do you go to school on foot?
You don't have to study.
Are you studying?
You will study.
Have you lost your reason?
Apart from you, we are all poor.
You have good taste in clothes.
You shouldn't make light of a cold.
Are you subject to colds?
Did you get over the cold?
You must keep your room tidy.
You used to look up to your father.
zh: 你过去很崇拜你的父亲。

en: You look as if you don't have a care in the world.
What time do you usually leave home?
You should cross out any word you don't need.
zh: 你应该划掉任何你不需要的词。

en: Can you make sense of what the writer is saying?
zh: 你能理解作者在说什么吗？

en: You take more calories than are necessary.
zh: 你摄入的热量超过了必要的量。

en: You must fulfill your promise without fail.
zh: 你必须毫不含糊地履行你的承诺。

en: You will never fail to be moved by beauty.
zh: 你永远都会被美所感动。

en: You have only to sit quietly with your hands folded in your lap.
zh: 你只需要安静地坐着，双手放在膝盖上。

en: Your nose is bleeding.
You are a beautiful butterfly.
Have you ever traveled by air?
Can you give up your seat to old people even when you are tired?
zh: 即使你很累，你也能给老人让座吗？

en: As you are tired, you had better take a rest.
Do you think her attractive?
You must help her.
Are you going to invite her to the party?
zh: 你打算邀请她参加聚会吗？

en: You are taller than she.
You should take her illness into consideration.
zh: 你应该考虑到她的病情。

en: It is necessary for you to help her.
You must have known what she meant.
zh: 你一定知道她是什么意思。

en: You lack sincerity for her.
All you have to do is to meet her.
What do you want to buy for her?
What did you say you gave her for her birthday?
zh: 你说你给她买了什么生日礼物？

en: Be on your guard against her.
You must take into account the fact that she was ill.
zh: 你必须考虑到她生病的事实。

en: I suppose you like her.
You have only to wait for her return.
Do you hear from her often?
zh: 你经常收到她的消息吗？

en: You think he is a good doctor, and so he is.
zh: 你认为他是个好医生，他的确是。

en: You may rely on him.
You can employ him.
Do you know him?
You will banish him.
You believe him completely.
You can't blame him for the accident.
zh: 你不能因为这场事故责怪他。

en: Don't you think you ought to write them a thank-you note?
zh: 你不觉得你应该给他们写一张感谢信吗？

en: You are to stay here till they return.
zh: 你必须待在这里直到他们回来。

en: You can swim much better than him.
Are you listening to him?
Do you happen to know his name?
zh: 你碰巧知道他的名字吗？

en: Do you remember borrowing his book?
You must not give in to his unreasonable demands.
zh: 你绝不能屈服于他无理的要求。

en: You should follow his advice.
You should not laugh at his mistake.
zh: 你不应该嘲笑他的错误。

en: Can you make sense of what he says?
zh: 你能听懂他在说什么吗？

en: You should take account of what he said.
Can you produce evidence to clear him?
zh: 你能拿出证据来证明他的清白吗？

en: Do you know his brother?
You can't count on him for financial help.
zh: 你不能指望他提供经济上的帮助。

en: You should not trifle with his feelings.
zh: 你不应该玩弄他的感情。

en: Can you state the facts to his face?
zh: 你能当着他的面陈述事实吗？

en: All you had to do was to tell him the truth.
zh: 你所要做的就是告诉他真相。

en: You only have to follow him.
You have to get him to help you.
I don't believe you've met him.
Cheer him up when you see him.
zh: 你见到他的时候，让他高兴起来。

en: I wish you had not told him about the plan.
zh: 我真希望你没把计划告诉他。

en: You had better ask him how to do it.
Are you related to him?
As long as you are with him, you can't be happy.
zh: 只要你和他在一起，你就不会快乐。

en: Who do you think he is?
You must take into account the fact that he is too young.
zh: 你必须考虑到他太年轻这个事实。

en: I suppose you like him.
Are you for or against the plan he put forward at the meeting?
zh: 你赞成还是反对他在会议上提出的计划？

en: Did you notice him leave the house?
zh: 你注意到他离开房子了吗？

en: Do you know where he lives?
Do you think he was only making believe that he was sick?
You know who he is.
Didn't you know that he passed away about two years ago?
zh: 你不知道他大约两年前去世了吗？

en: You must go, like it or lump it.
Are you always at home in the evening?
You make a box.
You are tall, but he is still taller.
You look young for your age.
zh: 你看上去比你的实际年龄年轻。

en: You only have to work hard.
You should school yourself to be patient.
zh: 你应该培养自己的耐心。

en: What do you do on Sunday?
You are not Japanese.
Do you speak Japanese?
Have you ever been to Nikko?
You must not come to meet me again.
zh: 你以后不要再来见我了。

en: Do you have two books?
You have two books.
You have two balls.
You'll soon get used to driving on the right.
zh: 你很快就会习惯靠右行驶的。

en: I understand you're looking for a record album of nursery rhymes.
zh: 我知道你在找一张童谣的唱片。

en: You are foresighted and will succeed.
You've only been on the job for about 15 minutes.
You are overworked.
You are working too hard. Sit down and take it easy for a while.
zh: 你工作太努力了。坐下来休息一会儿吧。

en: You are sharp.
You may stay with me for the time being.
zh: 你可以暂时和我住在一起。

en: You live in Tokyo, don't you?
Have you ever been to Tokyo?
How did you make a living in Tokyo?
zh: 你在东京是靠什么为生的？

en: Did you visit the Tokyo Tower?
zh: 你去参观过东京铁塔吗？

en: You have seen Tokyo Tower, haven't you?
Do you live in the city?
You don't like gambling, do you?
You must watch your step all the way.
zh: 你一路上都要小心脚下。

en: Can you go to the office by train?
zh: 你能坐火车去办公室吗？

en: Do you go by train or by car?
zh: 你是坐火车还是开车去？

en: You need a change of air.
You are an angel of a child.
You're a complete misanthrope.
zh: 你真是个十足的厌世者。

en: You are dying to go fishing.
Are you related to the Nagashima family?
zh: 你和长岛家有亲戚关系吗？

en: You can't stay for long.
Are you going to stay there for long?
zh: 你打算在那里待很久吗？

en: You don't have to get up early.
What do you do before breakfast?
Would you say you're a morning person?
zh: 你觉得自己是早上型的人吗？

en: What time do you wake up in the morning?
What time do you leave home in the morning?
You need not pay for your lunch.
Do you know how old Miss Nakano is?
zh: 你知道中野小姐多大了吗？

en: You have to work harder to make up for lost time.
zh: 你必须更加努力工作才能弥补失去的时间。

en: You ought to be ashamed of yourself.
zh: 你应该为自己感到羞耻。

en: Did you feel the earth move?
You are equal to him in intelligence.
You will get a CD set on your birthday.
Whose side are you?
Who are you talking with?
Who do you want to talk to?
You are free to talk with anyone.
zh: 你可以自由地和任何人交谈。

en: Who are you? Give us an answer to take back to those who sent us.
zh: 你是谁？给我们一个答案带回去给那些派我们来的人。

en: Were you with anyone?
You are very beautiful.
You run very fast.
Aren't you a very kind man?
zh: 你不是个非常善良的人吗？

en: You can swim very well.
You speak French very well. I wish I could speak it as well as you.
zh: 你的法语说得真好。我希望我能像你一样说得好。

en: You must speak in a loud voice.
I hear you're very rich.
You used to do so when you were a university student.
zh: 你以前上大学的时候经常这样做。

en: Do you go to college?
What do you want to study at college?
What did you major in at college?
Do you know that man with a big hat on?
zh: 你认识那个戴大帽子的人吗？

en: You must be more careful to avoid making a gross mistake.
zh: 你必须更加小心，避免犯严重的错误。

en: You must take care of yourself.
You should make your attitude clear.
Is there anything wrong with you?
You might just chalk up some brownie points.
zh: 你可能会因此获得一些好感。

en: You have to go through many hardships.
You must not invade the privacy of others.
zh: 你绝不能侵犯他人的隐私。

en: You have no right to interfere in other people's affairs.
zh: 你无权干涉别人的事务。

en: You shouldn't rely on other people's help.
zh: 你不应该依赖别人的帮助。

en: Can you speak another language?
Can you run fast?
You do not have to run fast.
You do run.
You look quite run down.
You are an early riser, aren't you?
Have you ever climbed Mt. Yari?
You get up early, don't you?
You have to get up early.
Which do you like better, fiction or non-fiction?
zh: 你更喜欢小说还是非小说？

en: All you have to do is to do your best.
You are quite in the wrong.
You have to make reservations in advance.
You may as well say it to him in advance.
Who did you vote for in the election?
zh: 你在选举中投票给谁了？

en: Do you travel by sea or by air?
zh: 你乘船旅行还是乘飞机旅行？

en: Did you ever travel abroad by ship?
zh: 你曾经乘船出国旅行过吗？

en: You should attend more to what your teacher says.
zh: 你应该多注意听老师说的话。

en: Were you praised by the teacher?
Were you scolded by your teacher?
You are a teacher.
You were busy last week.
Did you go to Ming's party last Saturday?
zh: 你上周六去明明的派对了吗？

en: Were you here last week?
Have you been in Japan since last month?
zh: 你从上个月开始就一直在日本吗？

en: Were you in America last month?
You ought to face the stark reality.
zh: 你应该面对残酷的现实。

en: You never used to treat me like this.
Keep in mind that you're not so young as you used to be.
zh: 记住你已经不像以前那么年轻了。

en: You are just the same as you always were.
You are not a student.
You had better cut down your living expenses.
zh: 你最好削减你的生活开支。

en: You must answer honestly.
You need not prepare a formal speech.
zh: 你不需要准备正式的演讲。

en: Are you correct?
I have faith in your ability to do the right thing.
zh: 我相信你有能力做正确的事情。

en: Are you interested in politics?
I'm sure you will succeed.
All you have to do is wait and see.
zh: 你所要做的就是等着瞧。

en: You know nothing of the world.
zh: 你对这个世界一无所知。

en: Your record in mathematics is good.
Are you good at mathematics?
You must take life as it is.
zh: 你必须接受生活的本来面目。

en: You guessed right.
You can succeed in your life.
zh: 你会在生活中获得成功的。

en: You should never look down on a man merely because he is poor.
zh: 你永远不应该仅仅因为一个人贫穷就看不起他。

en: You seem a kind man.
You are not kind.
You must set about your business in earnest.
zh: 你必须认真地开始你的工作。

en: Are you a new student?
You should make a fresh start in life.
zh: 你应该重新开始你的生活。

en: You're the new secretary, aren't you?
You will soon accommodate yourself new ways of living.
zh: 你很快就会适应新的生活方式。

en: Are you pleased with your new house?
zh: 你对你的新房子满意吗？

en: Have you got settled into your new house yet?
zh: 你已经在新房子里安顿好了吗？

en: You must request the latest version of the software.
zh: 你必须申请最新版本的软件。

en: You must bear it in mind.
You may not believe it, but it is nonetheless true.
zh: 你可能不相信，但它仍然是真的。

en: You must help set the table.
Can you cook a meal?
You need not wash the dishes after meals.
You must not eat too much.
You will be able to dance well.
Can you swim well?
You swim well, don't you?
zh: 你游泳游得很好，不是吗？

en: Do you play basketball well?
Do you get along with your boss?
zh: 你和你的老板相处得好吗？

en: You will be laughed at.
Sometimes you can't sleep at all.
Do you have any money?
You are not in the least happy.
Do you go to an elementary school?
You got the date wrong when you were filling in the check.
zh: 你填写支票时把日期搞错了。

en: You had better prepare for the future.
What do you intend to do with your future?
zh: 你打算如何规划你的未来？

en: You are a good tennis player, as beginners go.
zh: 作为初学者，你是一位优秀的网球运动员。

en: You ought not to go out.
You may as well postpone your departure.
zh: 你还不如推迟你的出发。

en: I asked her if she was going out.
You'd better not go out.
You have finished your homework, haven't you?
You have only to work away at your homework.
zh: 你只管努力做你的作业就行了。

en: Have you done your homework?
You have missed an important clue.
zh: 你错过了一条重要的线索。

en: Are you ten years old?
Did you inform the post office of the change of your address?
zh: 你通知邮局更改你的地址了吗？

en: You've lost the ability to concentrate.
zh: 你失去了集中注意力的能力。

en: What did you do on the weekend?
You must live according to your income.
Which do you like better, sushi or tempura?
zh: 你更喜欢寿司还是天妇罗？

en: You will write a letter.
What do you have in your hand?
Do you have a car?
Can you drive?
You must be more careful in driving a car.
Do you live in Sasayama?
Have you ever eaten turkey?
You have a dictionary, don't you? Can I use it?
zh: 你有一本字典，对吧？我能用一下吗？

en: You have three dictionaries.
You are free to go or stay.
How did you spend your free time?
zh: 你是怎么度过你的空闲时间的？

en: You must know yourself.
You should carry out your own plan.
zh: 你应该执行你自己的计划。

en: You are old enough to make your own living.
zh: 你已经足够大可以自食其力了。

en: I think you should do it yourself.
What do you say about yourself?
You did wrong in trusting too much in your ability.
zh: 你错在太相信自己的能力了。

en: You should act according to your conscience.
You always make excuses for not doing your share of the work.
zh: 你总是在为不做你那份工作找借口。

en: You are always making excuses for not doing your share of the work.
zh: 你总是在为不做你那份工作找借口。

en: All you have to do is to clean your room.
zh: 你只需要打扫你的房间。

en: You must not make little of your illness.
You need to have answers ready about your strong point.
zh: 你需要准备好关于你的优势的答案。

en: You should awake to your responsibilities.
zh: 你应该意识到你的责任。

en: You are satisfied with your life, aren't you?
zh: 你对你的生活感到满意，不是吗？

en: Do you have a vision of your future?
zh: 你对你的未来有憧憬吗？

en: You are satisfied with the argument.
zh: 你对这个论点感到满意。

en: Did you talk about your hobby?
You must not lose sight of your main object.
zh: 你绝不能忽视你的主要目标。

en: You must act according to your principles.
zh: 你必须按照你的原则行事。

en: You have to account for your failure.
zh: 你必须为你的失败负责。

en: You will just have to do with what you've got.
zh: 你只能将就着你所拥有的东西了。

en: You should attend to your business.
zh: 你应该专心于你的事业。

en: You don't have to write out a clean copy of your composition.
Can you justify your action?
zh: 你能证明你的行为是正当的吗？

en: You must carry out your first plan.
zh: 你必须执行你的第一个计划。

en: You must apologize for what you said.
zh: 你必须为你说过的话道歉。

en: You will wish you had a house of your own.
zh: 你会希望你有一栋自己的房子。

en: You should not stick to your opinion.
You dropped your handkerchief.
You do not always show that regard for the feelings of others which you would wish shown to you.
zh: 你并不总是像希望别人对待你那样，去体谅别人的感受。

en: Can you will yourself to fall asleep?
zh: 你能用意志让自己入睡吗？

en: You should go and see for yourself.
You must concentrate your attention on what you are doing.
zh: 你必须集中注意力在你正在做的事情上。

en: You cannot be too careful when you drive a car.
zh: 你开车时再小心也不为过。

en: Can you ride a bicycle?
You will get the better of him in the next election.
zh: 你会在下次选举中胜过他。

en: You should make good use of your time.
zh: 你应该好好利用你的时间。

en: Do you sometimes give your sister money?
zh: 你有时会给你妹妹钱吗？

en: You don't have to take an examination.
You are the most important person of us all.
zh: 你是我们所有人中最重要的人。

en: Will you go with us?
zh: 你愿意和我们一起去吗？

en: Do you refuse to leave with us?
zh: 你拒绝和我们一起离开吗？

en: You can understand me.
Are you trying to make a fool of me?
Do you know me?
I hope that you'll help me.
I'm afraid you misunderstood me.
You seem to have mistaken me for my elder brother.
zh: 你好像把我错认成我哥哥了。

en: What do you take me for?
Do you take me for a complete beginner?
zh: 你把我当成一个完全的新手吗？

en: You have more energy than I.
You are taller than I.
You are not as short as I.
You are not shorter than I.
You have made all my dreams come true.
zh: 你实现了我所有的梦想。

en: You know my favorite singer Terry Tate.
zh: 你知道我最喜欢的歌手泰瑞·泰特。

en: Did you hear my son play the violin?
zh: 你听到我儿子拉小提琴了吗？

en: You must bear my advice in mind.
zh: 你一定要把我的忠告记在心里。

en: You may use my dictionary.
You are my pride and joy.
You are as tall as my sister.
Do you understand the difficulty of my job?
zh: 你了解我工作的难度吗？

en: You were nodding off at times during my lecture.
zh: 我的讲座期间你时不时地打瞌睡。

en: You look upon my idea as being behind the times.
zh: 你看我的想法已经过时了。

en: Do you object to my idea?
Do you disobey me?
You speak my language.
You ought to have come to my wedding reception earlier.
zh: 你应该早点来我的婚礼招待会。

en: You mustn't use my pen.
You may use my typewriter.
You have only to watch what I do.
zh: 你只要看着我做什么就行了。

en: What did you do with my pants?
zh: 你把我的裤子弄到哪里去了？

en: Don't you believe me?
Did you see my camera?
He has twice as many books as I do.
You are twice as strong as I.
You remind me of a boy I used to know.
zh: 你让我想起我以前认识的一个男孩。

en: Do you mean to charge me with the crime?
What do you mean to say to me?
What would you have me do?
You are too kind to me.
You promised not to be rude to me any more.
zh: 你答应过不再对我无礼。

en: You were my Yoda and I'll miss your right-on-target advice.
zh: 你曾是我的尤达，我会怀念你一针见血的建议。

en: All you have to do is follow me.
You have the same camera as mine.
You are my equal; not my inferior or superior.
zh: 你和我平等，不是我的下属也不是我的上级。

en: Do you know them?
You may as well come with me.
zh: 你最好还是和我一起去吧。

en: You are the tallest of us all.
zh: 你是我们所有人中最高的。

en: You are trusted by every one of us.
Do you want to see our English lesson?
zh: 你想看看我们的英语课吗？

en: You were very kind to us.
Can you supply me with all I need?
zh: 你能提供我需要的一切吗？

en: You will soon be convinced that I am right.
zh: 你很快就会相信我是对的。

en: You're the only person that I can trust.
zh: 你是我唯一可以信任的人。

en: Do you know where I live?
Do you believe that there is life after death?
Can you express yourself in English?
zh: 你能用英语表达自己吗？

en: You have no heart.
Did you have a lot of happy experiences in your childhood?
zh: 你的童年有很多快乐的经历吗？

en: You wouldn't go to the dentist when you were a boy.
zh: 你小时候不愿意去看牙医。

en: You expect too much of your child.
zh: 你对你的孩子期望太高了。

en: Did you catch the first train?
zh: 你赶上第一班火车了吗？

en: You can use my desk if you want to.
zh: 如果你想，你可以用我的桌子。

en: Carry on with your work.
Have you finished your work?
Are you through with your work?
You must do work.
You must attend to your work.
"I believe you like your job." "On the contrary, I hate it."
zh: “我相信你喜欢你的工作。”“恰恰相反，我讨厌它。”

en: I believe you like your job.
zh: 我相信你喜欢你的工作。

en: You do not have to take your umbrella with you.
You needn't have taken an umbrella with you.
You should have known better than to go out in the rain without an umbrella.
zh: 你应该知道下雨天出门不带伞是不对的。

en: You'll get there by three o'clock.
zh: 你三点之前会到达那里。

en: Did you have a good sleep last night?
Were you tired last night?
You must have been surprised to find me alone with her last night.
zh: 昨晚你一定很惊讶地发现我和她单独在一起。

en: You should have seen that movie last night.
zh: 你昨晚应该去看那部电影的。

en: Did you drive her home last night?
zh: 你昨晚开车送她回家了吗？

en: You have changed since I saw you last year.
zh: 自从去年见到你以来，你变了。

en: You had to come yesterday.
Did you enjoy yourself yesterday?
Did you play baseball yesterday?
Were you busy yesterday?
Did you study yesterday?
Did you go to Nikko yesterday?
Did you talk to your new classmates yesterday?
zh: 你昨天和你的新同学说话了吗？

en: You ate sushi yesterday, didn't you?
You went to the park yesterday, didn't you?
You were absent from school yesterday.
Did you go to school yesterday?
You were at home yesterday, weren't you?
"Were you at home?" "No, I wasn't."
Were you home last night?
When were you busy yesterday?
Which program did you watch yesterday?
Did you watch TV yesterday?
Have you been busy since yesterday?
zh: 你从昨天开始一直很忙吗？

en: When did you study yesterday?
zh: 你昨天什么时候学习的？

en: You have only to answer the first question.
zh: 你只需要回答第一个问题。

en: You seem to have lost sight of original objective.
zh: 你似乎已经忘记了最初的目标。

en: You should carry out your first plan.
zh: 你应该执行你的第一个计划。

en: Who do you like better, Sachiko or Akiko?
zh: 你更喜欢幸子还是明子？

en: You will have to go through hardship.
What are you going to do tonight?
You aren't busy now, are you?
You are busy now, aren't you?
Will you stay at home tonight?
Where do you want to go this summer?
You don't have to work today.
Have you read today's paper?
Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
zh: 你今天下午想去动物园吗？

en: What time did you get up this morning?
zh: 你今天早上几点起床的？

en: You'll have to study harder from now on.
zh: 从现在开始，你得更努力学习了。

en: You are singing now.
You are now on the way to recovery.
What must you do now?
Have you ever seen a whale?
What've you been up to?
Have you ever seen her?
Have you ever seen Tokyo Tower?
Have you ever been to Kobe?
Have you ever visited Kyoto?
Have you ever visited a foreign country?
Have you ever climbed Mt. Aso?
Where have you been all this while?
zh: 你这段时间都去哪儿了？

en: You'd better go home.
You are not watching TV now.
Do you like black cats?
It is better for you to act by legal means.
zh: 你最好通过法律手段来行动。

en: Have you ever been to Washington, the capital of the United States of America?
zh: 你去过美国首都华盛顿吗？

en: Are you a high school student?
He said that you had better go.
He said that you need not go.
You don't need to go.
Would you like to go?
He said that you ought to go.
You must not indulge in drinking.
zh: 你绝对不能沉迷于饮酒。

en: You have to go whether you like it or not.
You can take whatever you like.
zh: 你喜欢什么都可以拿走。

en: You ought to live up to your parents' hopes.
zh: 你应该不辜负你父母的期望。

en: You must do all you can lest you should regret later.
zh: 你必须尽你所能，免得以后后悔。

en: What do you want to do in the afternoon?
You must do as you are told.
I think you've gone too far.
I think you had better stick to your present job.
zh: 我觉得你最好还是坚持你现在的工作。

en: Are you content with your present salary?
zh: 你对你现在的工资满意吗？

en: You must go to Harajuku.
You missed two assignments; you will have to make them up at once.
zh: 你错过了两次作业，你必须立刻补上。

en: You must take care of the dog.
You had better keep early hours so you will be in good health.
zh: 你最好早睡早起，这样你才能身体健康。

en: You should take more exercise for the sake of your health.
zh: 为了你的健康，你应该多做运动。

en: How many classes do you have on Mondays?
Do you subscribe to any monthly magazine?
zh: 你订阅什么月刊杂志吗？

en: How many times a month do you write letters?
You are a cold-blooded person, aren't you?
zh: 你是一个冷血的人，不是吗？

en: You're too young to marry.
zh: 你太年轻了，不适合结婚。

en: It's about time you got married.
You must never resort to violence.
You must account for your absence.
zh: 你必须解释你为什么缺席。

en: You have infinite possibilities as an artist.
zh: 你作为一名艺术家有无限的可能性。

en: You should go to the police and check it out yourself.
zh: 你应该去警察局自己查一下。

en: You're dating a Keio university student, aren't you?
zh: 你在和庆应大学的学生约会，是吗？

en: What will you do on Friday?
You are stupid.
You should have been more careful in money matters.
zh: 你在金钱方面应该更小心。

en: Are you getting along with your neighbors?
zh: 你和你的邻居相处得好吗？

en: You are crazy.
You say the bridge is safe; I will take care all the same.
zh: 你说桥是安全的，但我还是要小心。

en: How long will you stay in Kyoto?
Did you take part in the game?
Your lies pain me.
Do you know how to cook fish?
Did you live in Sasayama last year?
Did you give it to him last year?
Where did you live last year?
Have you lived in Sasayama since last year?
zh: 你从去年开始就住在篠山吗？

en: How many Christmas cards did you write last year?
zh: 你去年写了多少张圣诞卡？

en: You are richer than I am because your pay is double my pay.
zh: 你比我富有，因为你的工资是我的两倍。

en: You must hurry up.
You must get ready quickly.
Where did you spend your holidays?
Where will you go for the vacation?
Where do you wish you could go for a holiday?
Can you stand on your hands?
You should refrain from smoking.
Do you object to smoking?
You have a good memory.
You will drive me mad.
You should try to make the most of your opportunities.
zh: 你应该尽量利用你的机会。

en: You need not run the risk.
You look so pale.
You had better have your eyes examined.
zh: 你最好去检查一下眼睛。

en: I should think you are in the wrong.
You made an error.
It appears to me that you put on my hat by mistake.
zh: 在我看来，你好像不小心戴了我的帽子。

en: You no doubt bore people.
zh: 你无疑会让人们感到厌烦。

en: You will soon get well.
You play a musical instrument, don't you?
Are you a student?
You may bring your own lunch to school.
zh: 你可以自带午餐到学校。

en: You go to school.
You are a schoolteacher, aren't you?
Do you go to school on foot or by bicycle?
zh: 你步行还是骑自行车去学校？

en: Do you walk to school?
You go to school, don't you?
You don't remember, I'll never forget.
zh: 你不记得了，我永远不会忘记。

en: I thought you had better not go out.
zh: 我认为你最好不要出去。

en: Have you ever been to a foreign country?
Do you have any foreign books?
How long did you stay abroad?
You are a good painter, aren't you?
zh: 你是一位优秀的画家，对吧？

en: You are a very good artist.
zh: 你是一位非常优秀的艺术家。

en: Did you go abroad for pleasure or on business?
zh: 你是出国旅游还是出差？

en: Are you content with your position in the company?
zh: 你对你在公司的职位满意吗？

en: You must account for your absence from the meeting.
zh: 你必须解释你为什么缺席会议。

en: You have no obligation to help us.
Are you interested in flowers?
You can sing a song.
Are you going to sing?
You can take advantage of your free time.
zh: 你可以利用你的空闲时间。

en: You should make better use of your free time.
zh: 你应该更好地利用你的空闲时间。

en: You are required to provide three months' rent in deposit.
zh: 你需要支付三个月的房租作为押金。

en: You must think of your family.
You should go over a house before buying it.
zh: 你应该在买房前仔细检查一下房子。

en: You must go home.
Where did you put our key to the house?
zh: 你把我们家的钥匙放在哪里了？

en: You may go home.
I thought it better for you to stay at home.
zh: 我认为你最好待在家里。

en: You don't have to stay home.
Where are you going spend the summer holidays?
What are you going to do during the summer holidays?
zh: 你打算在暑假期间做什么？

en: You should call your mother as soon as possible.
zh: 你应该尽快给你的母亲打电话。

en: How many pencils do you have?
You keep on making the same mistake time after time.
How many sisters do you have?
How many siblings do you have?
How large is your family?
Where are you bound for?
When did you have your wall painted?
How many hours have you been studying?
What time do you leave your work?
What time will you have to go to bed?
What time do you leave for school?
What time are you going to leave for London?
zh: 你打算几点出发去伦敦？

en: She asked me how old I was.
What sign were you born under?
What prevented you from working?
Why are you busy today?
Why did you live in Kyoto last year?
zh: 你去年为什么住在京都？

en: How often did you visit Kyoto?
What don't you have?
What do you have?
What are you worrying about?
What are you gazing at?
What are you trying to do?
What would you like to do?
You must leave here before everything.
zh: 你必须在一切发生之前离开这里。

en: You have only to stand there doing nothing.
zh: 你只需要站在那里什么都不做。

en: What subject do you major in?
I wonder what you were referring to.
zh: 我想知道你指的是什么。

en: How fast you walk!
How fast you run!
What a good speaker of English you are!
What a clever student you are!
You have everything.
You had better not think of everything in terms of money.
zh: 你最好不要什么都用钱来衡量。

en: Can you hear anything?
Do you have anything to read?
Do you have anything particular in mind?
zh: 你有什么特别的想法吗？

en: Do you have any animals?
You seem to have thought of something else.
Do you need any food?
Do you want anything to eat?
Do you believe in any religion?
How many languages do you speak?
Can you think of anything else?
Do you have anything to wear to the dance?
zh: 你有什么可以穿去参加舞会的吗？

en: You have a genius for music.
zh: 你在音乐方面很有天赋。

en: Are you interested in music?
Which do you like better, music or English?
zh: 你更喜欢音乐还是英语？

en: You don't like music.
Did you ever go to Okinawa?
You should be more careful at a crosswalk.
zh: 在人行横道上你应该更小心。

en: Do you have a pencil?
Write it in pencil.
Who were you waiting for at the station?
Are you on your way to the station?
Have you ever subscribed to any English language newspaper?
zh: 你有没有订阅过任何英文报纸？

en: You have to speak English.
Are you studying English?
Are you listening to English?
You are listening to English.
Can you translate English into Japanese?
zh: 你能把英语翻译成日语吗？

en: You will succeed in learning English.
Do you know how to speak English?
Have you finished your English homework yet?
Do you like Japanese or English?
Can you write a letter in English?
Can you communicate in English what you want to say?
zh: 你能用英语表达你想说的话吗？

en: You have to speak only English.
You can speak English.
You must endeavor to improve your English.
zh: 你必须努力提高你的英语水平。

en: Do you like English?
You had better learn either English or French.
You can swim, but I can't swim.
zh: 你会游泳，但我不会游泳。

en: Are you able to swim?
Do you know how to swim?
You aren't leaving Japan for good, are you?
zh: 你不是要永远离开日本，是吗？

en: Can you swim across?
Do you feel like going to the theater?
Besides, you lead a charmed life.
You're in luck.
You must be worn out after working all day.
zh: 你工作了一整天，一定很累了吧。

en: Can you go around the world in a day?
zh: 你能在一天之内环游世界吗？

en: You can borrow three books at a time.
Do you know her at all?
You need to work very hard.
zh: 你需要非常努力地工作。

en: It is necessary for you to work hard.
You have to work hard.
You must study English hard.
Would you like a single room?
Will you travel alone?
You have only to set out on a trip by yourself.
zh: 你只要自己出发旅行就行了。

en: How many times a week do you go shopping at a supermarket?
zh: 你一周去超市购物几次？

en: You must finish this work in a week.
zh: 你必须在一周内完成这项工作。

en: You should follow your doctor's advice.
zh: 你应该听从医生的建议。

en: You are not a doctor.
Do you want the doctors not to use the machine and let your brother die?
zh: 你想让医生不用机器，让你弟弟死吗？

en: You will see the difference.
All you have to do is to make a comment.
zh: 你只需要发表评论即可。

en: You had wanted to go there for a long time, hadn't you?
zh: 你早就想去那里了，不是吗？

en: You must come back before it gets dark.
You are a bad boy.
Who do you like better, Akiko or Sachiko?
zh: 你更喜欢秋子还是幸子？

en: You referred to my father.
Did you make that mistake on purpose?
zh: 你是故意犯那个错误的吗？

en: Have you been to London?
You learned English from Miss Long, didn't you?
zh: 你跟龙老师学的英语，是吧？

en: Do you know if Lucy can speak Japanese?
zh: 你知道露西会不会说日语吗？

en: Which do you like better, apples or oranges?
zh: 苹果和橘子你更喜欢哪个？

en: Do you like apples or oranges?
Are you fond of listening to the radio?
Did you hear the news on the radio?
zh: 你从收音机里听到新闻了吗？

en: How many rackets do you have?
You are Simon, son of John.
You've never been to Europe, have you?
zh: 你从来没去过欧洲，是吗？

en: Did you get good marks?
It is necessary that you take a good rest.
zh: 你有必要好好休息一下。

en: You've got a great sense of humor.
You should be more reasonable.
It is necessary for you to study harder.
You must study grammar more.
You have to study Japanese harder.
zh: 你必须更努力地学习日语。

en: You need to be more careful.
You must do it much more carefully.
zh: 你必须更仔细地做这件事。

en: You should study English harder.
zh: 你应该更努力地学习英语。

en: All you have to do is study harder.
I hope you will come up with a better plan.
zh: 我希望你能想出一个更好的计划。

en: He as well as you is in the wrong.
I took it for granted that you were on our side.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你是我们这边的人。

en: I took it for granted that you would join us.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会加入我们。

en: I take for granted that you will be coming to the meeting.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会来参加会议。

en: I took it for granted that you would attend the meeting.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会参加会议。

en: He as well as you is tired of this work.
zh: 他和你一样都厌倦了这份工作。

en: Have you finished breakfast yet?
Have you finished your lunch yet?
You are no longer a baby.
Have you finished the suggested reading?
It is high time you were in bed.
Have you finished writing the letter yet?
Have you washed the car yet?
Have you finished cleaning your room yet?
You are not a child anymore.
Now that you have finished your work, you are free to go home.
zh: 既然你已经完成了工作，你可以自由回家了。

en: Now that you are well again, you can travel.
zh: 既然你已经康复了，你可以去旅行了。

en: It is time that you got up.
It is time you should get up.
Have you heard the news yet?
You will soon be used to rural life.
zh: 你很快就会习惯乡村生活的。

en: You are sitting between Meg and me.
Everything you said in your mail is just right - except the price.
zh: 你邮件里说的一切都很好——除了价格。

en: You are by far the best swimmer of us all.
zh: 你绝对是我们所有人中最好的游泳健将。

en: Do you sell mini disks?
You look as if you had seen a ghost.
zh: 你看上去好像见了鬼一样。

en: Are you fond of Maltese dogs?
You'll be crying before long.
You are absolutely right.
